awards.name: [1Z0-803] Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmer
[DXC Technology] - Top Performance of the Department

responsibilities: Work and collaborate in a delivery team that usually has 2-3 offshore members.
Work directly under an onshore UK/US technical lead and an UK/US onshore project manager.
Provide daily reports and attend project weekly meetings.
Configure and/or customize an Electronic Document Management System (EDMS) application.
Support testers during validation phase (dry-run and formal)
Troubleshoot and fix issues and record solutions in Disaster Recovery environment before applying them into Production environment.
Authoring, updating and executing Installation Qualification scripts (IQs) to deploy and configure pre-qualified image of a bundle of EDMS (Electronic Document Management System) apps
Attending meetings with onshore Technical Lead and clientâ€™s technical lead to monitor progress, address issues and provide solutions for the Development environment.

Support testers during validation phases (dry-run and formal), troubleshoot and fix issues and record solutions in the Disaster Recovery environment before applying them into the Production environment.
Develop a set of applications using MS PowerPlatform in order to automate the operations and centralize data in a factory using low-code platforms.
Research, consult and deploy ERP solutions to help factories reduce waste and optimize resources during daily operation.
Tools: Microsoft PowerApps, Power Automate, Power BI
Develop web app for selling private keys to the investor using ReactJS, GoLang, NodeJS, GraphQL, Solidity

Research on some of the AI open-source libraries to create virtual idols for the metaverse (e.g: mixing faces of famous celebrities and other dataset to train a new models, in order to mass generating faces used as a virtual online characters)
